sen.j: 蟻通 七五三之進（ありどお ししめのしん、生没年不詳）は壬生浪士組、新選組の隊士である。
sen.e: Shimenoshin ARIDOSHI (years of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Miburoshigumi (Mibu masterless warriors group which was the forerunner of the Shinsengumi) and the Shinsengumi (literally, the newly selected corps, referring to a special police force for the Tokugawa regime).

sen.j: よく珍しい苗字からか、蟻通勘吾と間違えられるが、全くの別人である。
sen.e: Due to his rare family name, Shimenoshin is often mistaken for Kango ARIDOSHI, but the two persons are totally different.

sen.j: 文久三年五月頃（1863年6月～7月）に入隊し、同月二十五日（1863年7月10日）の「幕府提出上書署名者一覧」に名前を連ねている。
sen.e: Shimenoshin joined the Miburoshigumi in around June or July, 1863, as his name appeared in a 'List of Signers for Official Documents Submitted to the Shogunate' ('Bakufu Teishutsu Josho Shomeisha Ichiran' in Japanese) which was dated July 10, 1863.
